description:
# Offsetting monoportal

This monoportal offsets input by half of its height. To save continuity, it need to be supported with two more portals.

Only offsetting by half-width and 0-width resulting in continuous portal, you can view that other types of offsetting is breaks portal and image.

Flat.is_inside:
if ((b_mat_inv * pos).z > 0.) return NOT_INSIDE;

return is_inside_triangle(x, y, 2.0, 0.6, 0.05, black_solid_M, white_solid_M);

if ((a_mat_inv * pos).z < 0.) return NOT_INSIDE;

return is_inside_triangle(x, y, 2.0, 0.6, 0.05, black_solid_M, white_solid_M);
